ComicInfo.Summary:
SERIES FINALE!
“NO AUTHORITY BUT YOURSELF,” Conclusion
Grant McKay has seen everything there ever was, is, and could conceivably be, but he still has one final choice to make. This is it. The end of RICK REMENDER and MATTEO SCALERA’s seminal science fiction epic—featuring a stunning wraparound variant cover from ANDREW ROBINSON! Don’t miss it for the world.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|--------------------|---------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Matteo Scalera & Moreno DiNisio | 1 | | B | Wraparound Cover B | Andrew Robinson | 2-3 | | C | Cover C | Matteo Scalera & Moreno DiNisio | 4 |
ComicInfo.Title: No Authority But Yourself, Conclusion
